entry.title: Curiosity Killed the Cat
entry.summary:
Author: robinspanties (Aslannbg)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,586Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 435

Summary: When Tim Drake was eight years old, he became convinced that the abandoned manor next to his home belonged to a secret family of vampires. Four years later, his theories were proven true to him. Six years after that, he finally starts to get closer to what's really going on in Gotham.Human Tim Drake stalks a family full of vampires. They're weirdly chill about it.

entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,041Chapters: 11/16Kudos: 114

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,971Chapters: 6/46Kudos: 56

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all.Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... Around Christmas?

Summary: It's not the job that goes wrong, oh no. It's the few moments after, as Jason speeds down Gotham streets on his motorcycle. It has nothing to do with Dick's absolutely bizarre bet with Steph about whether or not he can twerk while driving his bike. Clearly, Dick has no part in why Jason breaks his leg whatsoever. Jason did NOT see that and did NOT drive straight into a metal railing on the road because he was so damn distracted, no sir!Lies, lies, all lies.But Jason won't say any of this to Dick. entry.title: Legacy Protocol (Teen Celebrities Join the DCU)
entry.summary:
Author: DrDevious

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,165Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Legacy Protocol is a story following multiple characters, based on real life people, within the universe of all your favorite heroes. Follow these celebrities, born into villain-ness, as they go on a journey of rehabilitation, correcting their naturally evil ways, learning to use their powers, and becoming civilians in society.Legacy Protocol is, by all means, a story without story. Truthfully this is just an excuse for me to create a universe where all of my favorite actors, actresses and influencers are friends, which also means I am VERY OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS, whether it's a celebrity you want incorporated, who their villain (or hero) parent is, or both. While there will be character growth, and romance (ooo), I'm not starting this story with a primary ending in mind, if there even will be an ending. Please be mindful, English is not my first language as I come from Italy, but I am in love with America's people and stories.

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,311Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 52

Summary: “I will say this once, as you seem to have forgotten one of the rules. The whores are to be treated better than those Thoroughbred stallions. This is a symbiotic relationship. Mutualism to be specific. Submit your report by tomorrow… or there will be a problem.”“You-!” the human slime is cut off by a hand around the back of his neck. Jason’s singular guard pulls said slime to his feet and hauls him out of the room, throwing him unceremoniously outside.“Dismissed,” Jason says.The table is cleared in a moment, the others all walking over the slime to get away.Jason waits a minute, “I had that handled.”“He needed a reminder.”
